mapper.select:
SELECT ID, TRANS_FLOW_ID, CUST_ID, TRANS_CODE, MOBILE, PIN, NAME, ID_TYPE, ID_CODE, BIRTHDAY, ADDR, POST, EMAIL, RESERVE, SEND_DATE, SEND_TIME, STATUS, INST_DATETIME, RTN_DATE, RTN_TIME, RTN_SEQ, RTN_CODE, RTN_INFO, RTN_CARD_NO, UPDATE_DATETIME, BAL_STATUS FROM CLEAR_JGKJ_REGISTER T WHERE 1 = 1 AND t. STATUS = 'EXCEPTION'
AND T.MOBILE LIKE CONCAT('%',#{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
AND T.NAME LIKE CONCAT('%',#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
AND T.TRANS_FLOW_ID LIKE CONCAT('%',#{transFlowId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
AND T.ID_CODE LIKE CONCAT('%',#{idCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
ORDER BY T.INST_DATETIME DESC
